channel.title: Fernando Gomez - A blog about coding
channel.description: A blog about my favorite coding sites and tutorials.

item.title: Coursera Python Course
item.description: This course aims to teach everyone the basics of programming computers using Python. We cover the basics of how one constructs a program from a series of simple instructions in Python.

item.title: Amazon Web Dev Conference
item.description:
Amazon Web Dev Conference is a one-day, one-track conference held in Seattle, WA. It’s hosted by Amazon Corporation, the biggest online store!

At this year’s conference, I had lots of fun, learned a ton, and met many talented web designers and developers.
